newsitem.title: USA: Aircoa says expects to finish talks with RHM.
newsitem.headline: Aircoa says expects to finish talks with RHM.

text.p: Aircoa Hotel Partners LP said Friday it expects to conclude in two weeks negotiations to buy Regal Hotel Management Inc.
The company said the negotiations are for the purchase of all the class A and B units not owned by RHM or its affiliates for $2.35 per class A unit and $16.80 per class B unit.
The company said the discussions have concerned a possible merger in which cash would be paid to holders of the class A ond class B units, not affiliated with RHM and its affiliates.
The company said the RHM proposal currently does not represent a binding offer and could be withdrawn at any time.
